author: Ryan Lovelace
title: Christy McLaughlin, tech-savvy candidates get creative as coronavirus upends campaigns - Washington Times
description: The coronavirus outbreak has brought a crashing halt to traditional campaigning, forcing candidates to find innovative ways to connect with voters while complying with the social distancing guidelines that define this brave new world.
content:
Forget about kissing babies, pressing the flesh or snapping selfies.
